Name: Advance
Description: +2 moves. You cannot play any more cards this turn.

Name: Advance
Description: +2 moves. You cannot play any more cards this turn.

Name: Advance
Description: +2 moves. You cannot play any more cards this turn.

Name: Bolster
Description: Place 1 Acolyte from your hand on each space where you already have an Acolyte.

Name: Convene
Description: Pull all Acolytes adjacent to your Colossus onto your Colossus's space.

Name: Convene
Description: Pull all Acolytes adjacent to your Colossus onto your Colossus's space.

Name: Convert
Description: Replace opponent Acolytes on your Colossus's space with Acolytes from your hand. Once you are out of Acolytes from your hand, stop.

Name: Convert
Description: Replace opponent Acolytes on your Colossus's space with Acolytes from your hand. Once you are out of Acolytes from your hand, stop.

Name: Intimidate
Description: Push all Acolytes adjacent to your Colossus 1 space away. Acolytes pushed off the island are killed.

Name: Intimidate
Description: Push all Acolytes adjacent to your Colossus 1 space away. Acolytes pushed off the island are killed.

Name: Pilfer
Description: Draw 2 Colossus cards.

Name: Pilfer
Description: Draw 2 Colossus cards.

Name: Purge
Description: Move each Acolyte on your Colossus's space to any adjacent space (you can move Acolytes to different spaces).

Name: Purge
Description: Move each Acolyte on your Colossus's space to any adjacent space (you can move Acolytes to different spaces).

Name: Recall
Description: Move all of your Acolytes on the board to your Colossus's space. Then, add 2 Acolytes from your hand to your Colossus's space.

Name: Replace
Description: Swap any 2 Colossi on the island.

Name: Ritual Sacrifice
Description: For any Acolyte (including yours) on or adjacent to your Colossus's space, roll the die, and kill the Acolyte if you roll 1 or 2.

Name: Early Reap
Description: Choose a space where you have multiple Acolytes. Kill them, and Reap the space (even if you do not control it).

Name: Early Reap
Description: Choose a space where you have multiple Acolytes. Kill them, and Reap the space (even if you do not control it).

Name: Early Reap
Description: Choose a space where you have multiple Acolytes. Kill them, and Reap the space (even if you do not control it).

Name: Early Reap
Description: Choose a space where you have multiple Acolytes. Kill them, and Reap the space (even if you do not control it).

Name: Sacrifice
Description: Remove all of your Acolytes from the board and return them to your hand. Gain 1 Gold for each Acolyte you removed.

Name: Sacrifice
Description: Remove all of your Acolytes from the board and return them to your hand. Gain 1 Gold for each Acolyte you removed.

Name: Steal
Description: Steal an opponent's Trait. If it had cubes or tucked cards, discard them.

Name: Steal
Description: Steal an opponent's Trait. If it had cubes or tucked cards, discard them.

Name: Teleport
Description: Move one Colossus to any space.

Name: Teleport
Description: Move one Colossus to any space.

Name: Vandalize
Description: Discard an opponent's Trait. If it had cubes or tucked cards, discard them too.
